description: A face bolt that marks the L-Drago Beyblade, symbolizing its aggressive dragon spirit and tailored for attack-oriented customization.
This face bolt signifies the Pegasus Beyblade, embodying the swift and powerful mythical creature for speed and attack enhancements.
Represents the Leone Beyblade, featuring a lion emblem for defense-oriented Beyblades, emphasizing resilience and stability.
Marks the Sagittario Beyblade with an archer symbol, focusing on stamina and endurance in prolonged battles.
Symbolizes the Orion Beyblade, designed with balance in mind, incorporating the hunterâ€™s precision and versatility.
An energy ring designed for aggressive attacking strategies, enhancing left-spin interactions and impact force
Optimized for speed and rapid attacks, this energy ring facilitates quick, powerful strikes against opponents.
Focuses on defense, adding weight and stability to absorb and deflect incoming attacks effectively.
Engineered for stamina, it helps maintain rotational momentum longer, ideal for endurance matches.
A balanced energy ring that provides a mix of attack, defense, and stamina qualities for versatile performance.
Designed to create unpredictable movement patterns and enhance attack capabilities through aerodynamic and weight distribution adjustments.
Optimized for high-speed attacks, its design focuses on aggressive strikes and rapid movements.
A heavily weighted fusion wheel that prioritizes defense, offering enhanced protection against attacks with its solid construction.
Built for explosive attack power, it features a design that maximizes contact impact with opponents.
Offers mode-changing capabilities, allowing bladers to switch between aggressive attack modes and more defensive or stamina-focused strategies.
A lightweight spin track designed to lower the center of gravity and increase maneuverability and speed.
Features winged designs to provide additional lift and stability, enhancing the Beyblade's aerial capabilities and defense.
A standard-height spin track that offers a balanced performance, suitable for a variety of battling styles.
One of the tallest spin tracks available, providing a significant height advantage to dodge lower attacks and strike from above.
Left Flat, designed for aggressive, fast-paced movement in left-spin Beyblades, enhancing mobility and attack potential.
Right Rubber Flat, a performance tip for right-spin Beyblades that enables rapid, aggressive movement with increased grip.
Wide Ball, focused on stability and defense, its wide base helps maintain balance and resist knockouts.
Wide Defense, known for its balance between stamina and defense, it provides steady performance with a wider tip for enhanced endurance.
Bearing Drive, incorporates bearings to reduce friction, significantly improving stamina and stability for enduring battles.
